name: Quickcreator – AI Blog Writer
author: Quickcreator

sections.description:
Integrate QuickCreator’s Content Editor with WordPress, leveraging AI-driven content creation for SEO, and seamlessly publish your articles directly to WordPress.

QUICKCREATOR’S OFFICIAL WORDPRESS PLUGIN

A free WordPress plugin that will connect your WordPress page to QuickCreator’s Content Editor. QuickCreator’s WP plugin just saved you a step (or 2!). Write, publish and start ranking.

DEPENDENCIES ON THIRD-PARTY SERVICES

My Plugin relies on the following third-party service(s):

Quickcreator

The Quickcreator provide the following services:

  1. Account binding and unbinding
  2. Blog content generation
  3. Export of blog content to WordPress
  • Services:
    • front-end app: https://app.quickcreator.io/quick-blog
    • quickcreator’s api: https://api.quickcreator.io/landing-page-service
    • quickcreator’s docs: https://docs.quickcreator.io/docs/Integrations/wordpress-plugin
  • Terms of Use: Quickcreator Terms of Use
  • Privacy Policy: Quickcreator Privacy Policy

Legal Disclaimer

By using My Plugin, you agree to the terms and policies of the third-party service(s) listed above. It is your responsibility to ensure that your use of these services complies with all applicable laws and regulations.

EASY SETUP AND FAST INTEGRATION

It takes just a few minutes to download and install the plugin, and even less to publish your content!

  • Install the free WordPress plugin
  • Write highly rankable content using QuickCreator’s trusted guidelines
  • Publish directly to WordPress from QuickCreator’s Content Editor without any hassle

QUICKCREATOR RESOURCES AND SUPPORT

Get your questions answered whenever you need help. Simply go to our website and reach out to us via chat, or drop us an email at support@quickcreator.io.

READ MORE

Want more information about Search Engine Optimization and QuickCreator?

  • Join our Facebook Group
  • Find us on LinkedIn and YouTube
